description: Ringed in cobblestones, the courtyard is a combination of carefully placed stones and sprawling lawns.  Spindle-limbed dogwoods and cherry trees dot the landscape, their bright pink and white blossoms catching the sunlight.  Upon the far end of the courtyard, a sprawling villa is nestled amid a verdant garden, while opposite an ornate gate leads to the streets of the city.

Ringed in cobblestones, the courtyard is a combination of carefully placed stones and sprawling lawns.  Spindle-limbed dogwoods and cherry trees dot the landscape, their bright pink and white blossoms catching the moonlight.  Upon the far end of the courtyard, a sprawling villa is nestled amid a verdant garden, while opposite an ornate gate leads to the streets of the city.

Ringed in cobblestones, the courtyard is a combination of carefully placed stones and sprawling lawn.  Spindle-limbed dogwoods and cherry trees dot the landscape, their bright pink and white blossoms catching the sunlight.  At the far end of the courtyard, a sprawling villa is nestled amid a verdant garden, while opposite, an ornate gate leads to the streets of the city.  Dappled with golden sunlight through the trees, a foliage-lined pebble path leads through the garden to the back of the building, while a glass-paned white birch door offers entrance through the front.
title: [Meazernis Villa, Courtyard]
